thread.title: RCom's new Rs 149 prepaid plan offers unlimited calls and 3GB of 4G data per month
thread.title_full: RCom's new Rs 149 prepaid plan offers unlimited calls and 3GB of 4G data per month

title: RCom's new Rs 149 prepaid plan offers unlimited calls and 3GB of 4G data per month
text:
March 10, 2017 “RCom is now offering 1GB of 4G data at just Rs 49” 
Reliance Communications (RCom in short) has introduced new data and calling plans for its prepaid subscribers. The company has launched a new Rs 149 plan, which offers unlimited RCom to RCom local and STD calls along with 3GB of 4G data for 28 days. Also, the brand is now offering 1GB of 4G data at just Rs 49. 
Apart from the new Rs 149 plan, RCom has also announced that its prepaid users can enjoy unlimited 3G data at Rs 99 and unlimited 2GB data access at Rs 49 for 28 days. There’s no word on the daily fair usage policy on these data plans. 
In addition, the telco has announced that its new 2G users in Haryana, Uttar Pradesh East and West, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Kerala, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu and Chennai can avail unlimited 2G data (500MB FUP per day), Rs 20 talk time and call charges at 25 paise per minute, valid for 28 days, at Rs 49. 
RCom’s new users in Kolkata, Delhi, Himachal Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Mumbai, Punjab, Rajasthan and Jammu & Kashmir can avail unlimited 3G data (500MB/ day), Rs 20 talk time and voice calls at 25 paise par minute for 28 days at Rs 99. Facebook Comments
